Alexa Skills Tour

Boston | June 6th–7th

Sponsors:

Join us at one of our upcoming events in a city near you.

About the Tour

Voice technology is changing the way customers order items online, check email, even interact with their appliances. Tech-savvy brands realize the importance of the voice-activation trend and the need to develop the skills to interact with these platforms.


We’ve partnered with Amazon to launch a 10 city tour bringing together 2,500 talented developers to learn the skills necessary to build unique voice experiences with Alexa. The tour will take place in cities across the US and will consist of two-day training and hands-on learning.
